stats_data.name: mp
stats_data.description: determines the amount of spells and skills a unit can cast/use

stats_data.name: strength
stats_data.description: determines the power of physical attacks

stats_data.name: defense
stats_data.description: determines the reduction of physical damage taken

stats_data.name: magic
stats_data.description: determines the power of magical attacks

stats_data.name: magic defense
stats_data.description: determines the reduction of magical damage taken

stats_data.name: agility
stats_data.description: determines how often a unit gets a turn

stats_data.name: luck
stats_data.description: determines the chance of landing and evading a physical attack, as well as the chance of landing a critical hit

stats_data.name: evasion
stats_data.description: determines the chance of evading a physical attack

stats_data.name: accuracy
stats_data.description: determines the chance of landing a physical attack
